I loved this movie! It was all I could do not to break down into tears while watching it, but it is really very uplifting. I was struck by the ‘mood’ and spirit of this film. The characters are all well rounded and play off one another perfectly.

Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover. As he confesses to his psychiatrist (Kevin Spacey), the film traces the path that led Leland to the killing, and exposes the frustrations, addictions and shattered instruction of the people around him. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he pursued and the books, paintings and haiku he made.
Genre: Animation, Drama, Japanese

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to die by the townspeople, rises from the grave, has revenge on the town, and seeks Alice.
